SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM CONSULTS ORDER BY CONSULT_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CONSULT_ID as consultId, USER_ID as userId, CONSULT_USERNAME as consultUserName, CONSULT_TITLE as consultTitle, CONSULT_CONTENT as consultContent, CONSULT_EMAIL as consultEmail FROM CONSULTS WHERE CONSULT_ID = #{consultId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONSULTS ( CONSULT_ID, CONSULT_TITLE, CONSULT_CONTENT, CONSULT_EMAIL, CONSULT_USERNAME, USER_ID) VALUES ( CONSULTS_SEQ.nextval, #{consultTitle}, #{consultContent}, #{consultEmail}, #{consultUserName}, #{userId})
